newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: RAND MINES TO BE SUSPENDED, WOUND-UP.
newsitem.headline: RAND MINES TO BE SUSPENDED, WOUND-UP.

text.p: Rand Mines Limited said on Wednesday its listing in the cash sector of the Johannesburg Stock Exchange (JSE) would be suspended on May 22 ahead of the proposed winding-up of the company.
The group said its listing on the London Stock Exchange would also be suspended on that day.
The announcement comes after the group withdrew a cautionary statement towards the end of April in which it said it had received a proposal which could have included an offer for its ordinary shares.
As a result of the possible offer being withdrawn the winding up of the company would continue, the group said at the time.
